guideLink: Not what you're looking for? Check out all our guides

answer.text: Awaq Campus Internship (ACI) is a program that welcomes students in biology and environmental sciences seeking practical experiences in their field. We offer internship opportunities that promote environmental, social, and economic development in local communities.
